description: FreeSpaceLogView is a tool for Windows 10 that displays a log of free disk space on your system. This tool only works for NTFS formatted disks. For every log item, the following information is displayed: Log Time, Volume Name, Volume Guid, Lowest Free Space, Highest Free Space, Is Boot Volume (Yes/No). The free space log information is taken from the following event log channel: Microsoft-Windows-Ntfs/Operational FreeSpaceLogView allows you to get the disk free space information from your local computer, from remote computer on your network, and from external hard drive plugged to your computer.
